top_comments.comment: I saw that cover girl clean make up on another video and looks like they changed the cap color?  I loved the note a smell! I haven’t seen the foundation in any store near me because I want to revisit the foundation! That was my foundation back in mid 80’s and early 90’s! I am so interested in the Milan. I’ve been really loving their eye liner and eyebrow micro pencil!
That Cover Girl smell takes me back to middle school in the mid 90s!

Emily, I just wanted you to know that I watch all your videos and I also read all your descriptions and I still love your profound and random thought.  Just wanted you to know that I read and appreciate your thoughts! Lots of love from England x😘
Dear Emily, I enjoyed the Charlotte Tilbury so much and know this one will be just as great. Good morning Violetta hope you have a great day, a fellow makeup junkie too.

comments_since_last_sample.body: I just purchased the Covergirl Clean Matte and I absolutely LOVE it! I used to use it years ago, pre-Youtube. It is a beautiful light coverage that lasts all day! I don't even set it with powder! Don't sleep on Covergirl Clean makeup!
